attributes.action: Close all schools untill covid 19 is under proper control
attributes.additional_details: It's not the case of why I want you to do it is the case of the rest of the nation want you to act on this with the amount of rising cases and people too scared to get tested for covid 2 be done the schools are and natural breeding ground all viruses to mutate and to be passed on from people to people opening the schools after the first lockdown was potentially the most dangerous thing that you could have possibly have done I have previously worked in the Education industry and and every turn there is an outbreak of a strain of cold flu or virus this virus is out of control amongst our schools
attributes.background: Close all schools including mainstream and  private education until covid is under proper control and The Vaccines have been successful .

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

The latest guidance on schools returning in January is available here: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/schools-and-childcare-settings-return-in-january-2021/schools-and-childcare-settings-return-in-january-2021
